explanation: [0-0] The screen is split into two parts. In the upper part, a young man with slightly curly hair is covering his ears with both hands, his mouth slightly open, looking ahead in surprise. There are many people behind him in the stands. In the lower part, David Beckham is standing on a podium wearing a black suit and tie, smiling. The background is a gold striped curtain.
